title: 求大佬帮忙看看崩溃报告
author: 天启-麒麟
txt_content:
下面是崩溃报告，谢谢大佬们了
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Hi. I'm Minecraft, and I'm a crashaholic.

Time: 20-5-3 下午2:48
Description: There was a severe problem during mod loading that has caused the game to fail

replies.author: もぺもぺ
replies.txt_content:
安装这个 mod https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php? ... DMyNzE4MTJ8OTQ2MjAw

放入 mods/1.7.10 文件夹，且不要改名

replies.author: 天启-麒麟
replies.txt_content:
结城希亚 发表于 2020-5-3 14:50
删除[1.7.10]-NEI扩展-NEIIntegration-v1.1.1.jar
谢谢大佬可以了！！！能帮忙讲讲什么原理么= =谢谢了

replies.author: 结城希亚
replies.txt_content:
麒麟喵o 发表于 2020-5-3 14:54
谢谢大佬可以了！！！能帮忙讲讲什么原理么= =谢谢了
codechickenlib的原因
其实下面的方法也能用，不用删除nei
